Notes: ROBUST NULL age effects (all p>0.48). Extended 66-model comparison: SquareRoot+Lin best (9.9% weight). Model averaging resolves wrong-direction artifacts. Practice decomposition (Step 3, 2025-12-09): Age-invariant practice effects (Age×Phase p=0.41) - wrong-direction NOT explained by differential practice. VR Scaffolding Hypothesis STRENGTHENED: Immersive context compensates for hippocampal aging AND equalizes practice benefits across ages. REVERSES original interpretation (marginal→robust NULL). LIMITATION: Age range [20-70] with only 7 participants ≥65 may not capture critical hippocampal aging (70+); generalizability to older old adults uncertain.
ICC_slope=21.6% (forgetting IS trait-like, 432× larger than Lin+Log single model). Model averaging MANDATORY (best weight 5.7%). REVERSES original NULL finding.

Bidirectional trajectories revealed. Purification adequate for static screening, inadequate for two-process forgetting dynamics.
